<h1 align="center">
  Tetris
</h1>

a simple tetris game developed in Javascript.

## 🚀 Quick start

    ```shell
    # create a new Gatsby site using the hello-world starter
    git clone https://github.com/jiwon-seattle/tetris-Javascript
    cd respository
    ```

    Open `index.html` with local browser.

## 🧐 What I covered Javascript method

* addEventListener()
<details>
  <summary>addEventListener()</summary>
  The `EventTarget` method `addEventListener()` sets up a function that will be called whenever the specified event is delivered to the target. Common targets are `Element`, `Document`, and `Window`, but the target may be any object that supports events (such as XMLHttpRequest).
</details>
* querySelector()
* querySelectorAll()
* keyCode()
* Math.floor()
* Math.random()
* forEach()
* setInterval()
* some()
* add()
* remove()
* contains()
